com.twitter.heron.common.basics

Class NIOLooper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.common.basics.WakeableLooper
      • com.twitter.heron.common.basics.NIOLooper

  • public class NIOLooper
extends WakeableLooper
    A NIOLooper, implementing WakeableLooper, is a class wrapping a Java NIO selector to dispatch events. It extends WakeableLooper, so it will execute in a while loop unless the exitLoop() is called. And in every execution, in tasksOnWakeup(), it will handle the selected keys. The NIOLooper should start by calling loop()
